name: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Three - Catch a Ride
name_original: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Three - Catch a Ride
description:
Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Three - Catch a Ride is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Telltale Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Three - Catch a Ride is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
